00042 /*****************************************************************************/
00043 /**
00044  * translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack
00045  * Synopsis:
00046  *
00047  *  There is a catch 22 where the command line message handlers need to
00048  * have the PGOptions information in order to set up the message handling
00049  * log file name, etc. Resolve this by passing in a call back to the
00050  * TranslateEngine constructor which initializes the PGOptions.
00051  *
00052  * @param atdOopts - filled in with all the PGOptions data.
00053  *
00054  * @return - nada, initializes message handling.
00055  */
00056 /*****************************************************************************/
00057 static void translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack(ADTOptions & adtOpts)
00058 {
00059 
00060   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00061 
00062   string verboseLogName = Fs::join(adtOpts.m_outputDir,adtOpts.m_progName+".log");
00063 
00064   std::ofstream *verboseOFStream = new std::ofstream;
00065 
00066   Fs::mustOpenToWrite(*(verboseOFStream), verboseLogName.c_str());
00067 
00068   ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM logVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION;
00069   if (adtOpts.m_verbosity > ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION) {
00070     logVerbosity = (ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM) adtOpts.m_verbosity;
00071   }
00072 
00073   LogStream *verboseLogStream = new
00074   LogStream(logVerbosity,  verboseOFStream);
00075 
00076   Verbose::pushMsgHandler(verboseLogStream);
00077   Verbose::pushProgressHandler(verboseLogStream);
00078   Verbose::pushWarnHandler(verboseLogStream);
00079   Verbose::setLevel(adtOpts.m_verbosity);
00080 
00081   return;
00082 }
00083 // end translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack
00084 /*****************************************************************************/
00085 /*****************************************************************************/
00086 /**
00087  * @class ConsoleOverrideTest
00088  * @brief cppunit class for testing possible reference and variant values.
00089  */
00090 /*****************************************************************************/
00091 class ConsoleOverrideTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00092 {
00093 
00094 private:
00095 
00096   map<string, string>        m_oneToOneOptions;
00097   vector< vector< string > > m_sampleTable;
00098   vector< string >           m_experimentListVector;
00099   vector< string >           m_markerList;
00100 
00101   RunTimeEnvironment rte;
00102 
00103   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(ConsoleOverrideTest);
00104   CPPUNIT_TEST(setUp);
00105   CPPUNIT_TEST(run);
00106   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00107 
00108 public:
00109   void setUp();
00110   void run();
00111 };
00112 // end ConsoleOverrideTest
00113 /*****************************************************************************/
00114 /*****************************************************************************/
00115 /**
00116  * Initialization method called before each test routine.
00117  *
00118  */
00119 /*****************************************************************************/
00120 void ConsoleOverrideTest::setUp()
00121 {
00122 
00123   cerr << endl;
00124 
00125   m_oneToOneOptions["out-dir"]      = "output";
00126   m_oneToOneOptions["translate-file"]  = TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "DMET_Plus.r3.20081008.dc_translation.txt";
00127 
00128   m_oneToOneOptions["annotation-file"] =   TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "DMET_Plus.r3.20081008.dc_annot.csv";
00129 
00130   m_oneToOneOptions["genotype-override-file"] = TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "NA11832__HAPMAP_01A_0807_WC_Pilot2_37.dmet_uncalled.rpt";
00131 
00132   m_experimentListVector.push_back(TEST_DATA_UNIT_DIR + "NA11832__HAPMAP_01A_0807_WC_Pilot2_37.dmet.chp");
00133 
00134   return;
00135 }
00136 // end ConsoleOverrideTest::setUp
00137 /*****************************************************************************/
00138 /*****************************************************************************/
00139 /**
00140  * ConsoleOverrideTest::run
00141  *
00142  */
00143 /*****************************************************************************/
00144 void ConsoleOverrideTest::run()
00145 {
00146 
00147   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("ConsoleOverrideTest", "run");
00148 
00149   map<string, string>::iterator itSS;
00150 
00151   TranslationEngine te(NULL, C_CMDLINE | C_CONSOLE, &translateEngineMessageHandlingCallBack);
00152 
00153 
00154   for (itSS  = m_oneToOneOptions.begin();
00155        itSS != m_oneToOneOptions.end();
00156        itSS++) {
00157 
00158     te.setOpt(itSS->first, itSS->second);
00159   }
00160 
00161   te.setOpt("experiment-list-vector", m_experimentListVector);
00162 
00163   te.run();
00164 
00165 }
00166 // end ConsoleOverrideTest::run
